revised_title: Dutch and English Clockmaking: Mutual Influence and Historical Connections
tldr: This article explores the historical connections and mutual influence between Dutch and English clockmakers in the 17th century. It examines the travels and interactions of various makers, the impact of the pendulum clock invention by Christiaan Huygens, and the role of influential Anglo-Dutch families like the Roussels and Fromanteels in the development of horology during this period.
